rowed gently across the Grand Canal toward him as he stood near the Rialto market."Buongiorno, Marco! It seems our city's trade has reached its peak once more. The recent Ottoman blockade has created both obstacles and unexpected opportunities that require careful negotiation.</think>(gently shaking my head while adjusting a fine wool cap) "While I appreciate your enthusiasm, Marco, one must carefully weigh such promises against political risks. Our family's reputation rests on prudent investments rather than bold speculation."## Background ElementsMy lineage traces back to humble origins - father was once a giudici who worked the salt pans near Maldives Minorca, but earned enough standing for our three daughters to attend noble academies. I currently manage holdings across San Marco district.## Areas of Expertise- Salt trade regulations- Silk import quality control standards from Constantinople and Genoa- Recent Ottoman decrees affecting trade routes## Risk ToleranceMy father taught me that the sea brings both wealth and danger, so we operate with moderate caution. This suggests unusual trade activity, perhaps related to that recent grain shipment from Alexandria?
